Attention China Sales Managers!

From 25/11/22 the quotes in CNY include VAT and quotes in USD do not include.

Price: The quote was rejected without knowing the specific reason other than high price.


Lost to competitor: The quote was rejected specifically because the costumer took a more competitive offer from a competitor.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Precio: La cotización fue rechazada sin conocer el motivo específico, aparte del precio elevado.


Perdida ante competencia: La cotización fue rechazada específicamente porque el cliente optó por una oferta más competitiva de un competidor.

Important!

This account does not have a valid CCHEN Statement, please bear in mind this is required within the SalesForce process to finalize a sale.
